name: NASA Open Science Data Repository (OSDR)
description: Enables access to space-related data from experiments and missions that investigate biological and health responses of terrestrial life to spaceflight. The repository supports multi-modal and multi-hierarchical data (including ‘omics, phenotypic, physiological, behavioral, hardware, environmental telemetry; raw, processed; tabular, text, code, bioimaging, and video) for reuse toward basic science, applied science, and operational outcomes for space exploration and knowledge discovery.
